citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, a container of a liquid food reward for primates was stored in a small cooler with a flexible, gel-
filled cold pack. The cold pack was damaged, with puncture holes evident and gel observed leaking out of the pack. Two
syringes used to orally administer the reward were placed on top of the container with their tips in close contact with the
damaged cold pack and contaminated with the gel.
All food for non-human primates must be stored in a manner that prevents contamination to ensure the health of the
animals. This item was corrected at the time of inspection by discarding the syringes and replacing the cold pack. To
remain corrected after September 27th, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.75(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
At the time of inspection, a container of a liquid food reward for primates was stored in a small cooler with a flexible, gel-
filled cold pack. The cold pack was damaged, with puncture holes evident and gel observed leaking out of the pack. Two 
syringes used to orally administer the reward were placed on top of the container with their tips in close contact with the 
damaged cold pack and contaminated with the gel. 
 
All food for non-human primates must be stored in a manner that prevents contamination to ensure the health of the 
animals. This item was corrected at the time of inspection by discarding the syringes and replacing the cold pack. To 
remain corrected after September 27th, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
